title: Elec Packaging Assembly
description: The course provides hands-on instruction in electronics packaging, including assembly, reliability, thermal management, and test of next-generation microsystems.  Crosslisted with ECE and MSE 4754.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ECE 3040 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 3710 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
